title: Businesses Focused on Navigating Uncertainty, Says Marsh McLennan CEO
description: Marsh McLennan CEO John Doyle tells Open Interest that navigating complexity is the central concern for businesses today, particularly dealing with near-term uncertainty and managing the longer term impact of AI. (Source: Bloomberg)

shortSummary: Marsh McLennan CEO discusses the complexity and risks of global economic uncertainty, particularly wildfires and global cyber threats.
argos_summary: CEOs are increasingly focused on navigating a complex environment marked by geopolitical tensions, trade issues, and the risks associated with emerging technologies like AI. Cybersecurity remains a significant concern, particularly with the rising costs of risk and insurance due to severe weather events and litigation trends. While there has been some moderation in insurance prices, liability insurance costs continue to escalate, prompting businesses to strategize on managing these risks. Overall, there are signs of renewed investment activity as companies seek clarity in the evolving economic landscape.
